title: #97: Physically Cultured With Bert Sorin
description: I talk to the CEO of Sorinex, Bert Sorin about his family's strength training equipment company and they're mission to help people become physically cultured. We discuss why a man should be strong, the strength benchmarks every man should master and why grip strength should play an important role in your strength training.
author: contact@artofmanliness.com (The Art of Manliness)
